text: 4.9: Ro 8.36; 1 Ko 15.30-31; 2 Ko 6.9; Hi 10.33Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ nza muuŋgi fhuvara. Gu kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Fhe Bakɨme, ana nza kha Zisas farasegi ŋaara gumgi, ana nza ndiv zɨ guarara tɨgi. Mbe nza nzuav suaŋgim, mbe za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi gum Fhe Bakɨme enseri rɨmgi nɨman mbe nza shogɨrim, nza vhɨzɨrga.
